mapper.select: select * from board_type order by row_index
select * from (select * from notice order by n_date desc) where rownum < 6
select * from (select * from board order by b_date desc) where rownum < 11
select count(*) from store group by s_type having s_type='직영'
select count(*) from store group by s_type having s_type='가맹'

select * from (select sell.s_no, store.s_name, store.s_type, sum(sel_cost) as sel_cost from sell, store where sell.s_no=store.s_no and sel_date between to_date(#{from}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{to}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') group by sell.s_no, store.s_name, store.s_type order by sel_cost desc) where rownum < 4

select o_no, o_date, s_name, o_state, r from (select o_no, o_date, s_name, o_state , rownum r from (select a.o_no, a.o_date, c.s_name , a.o_state from orders a, store c where a.s_no = c.s_no and a.o_state='대기' ORDER by a.o_no desc) order by o_no desc) where r < 10
